summary.span: 將其他型別的執行個體來回轉換成 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Converts instances of other types to and from instances of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別支援的轉換的值和基底值類別支援。The class supports conversion of values and base values that the class supports.
